laboratory_examinations.findings: Lymphocytic pleocytosis with low glucose (41 mg/dL, normal >45), increased proteins (238 mg/dL, normal <45), and elevated adenosine deaminase (ADA) levels (13.9 U/L, normal <5).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Day 10: glucose 37 mg/dL, protein 508 mg/dL, ADA 37.7 U/L, leukocytes 804 (95% lymphocytes); Day 24: glucose 37 mg/dL, protein 147 mg/dL, ADA 15.5 U/L, leukocytes 35 (98% lymphocytes); Month 4: glucose 57 mg/dL, protein 71 mg/dL, leukocytes 9 (90% lymphocytes), ADA 5 U/L.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Serum titer of 55,000 (normal 0 –32) and a CSF titer of 22,000 (normal 0– 32).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: IgG index increased to 2.79 at Month 4.
